name: The Haunted City: Modern Monsters and Urban Legends
content: Spring-heeled Jack, Slender Man, underground lore and the Crying Boy. Join the London Fortean Society in London's dark heart for a day of modern monsters and urban myth. Our cityscapes are full of strange wonders, terrors and tales. Come hear of them. Speakers include: Mike Dash - Spring-heeled Jack Andrea Kitta - Slender Man Antony Clayton - Subterranean London Dr David Clarke - Tears for Fears: The Curse of the Crying Boy Tina Rath - The Hackney Bear Scott Wood - The Hidden Insult More speakers to be confirmed. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/224935-1?pid=4868 Prices: Standard: GBP 20.0, Concession: GBP 16.0 Time: 10:00 am to 5:00 pm Venue details: Conway Hall, 25 Red Lion Square, Greater London, WC1R 4RL, United Kingdom
